actions.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.
On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment requires the President's report to Congress on the cybersecurity needs of the Federal Government to examine the current security clearance and job suitability requirements that may serve as a deterrent to hiring an adequately trained cyberworkforce.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-410 to add "job security clearance and suitability requirements" to the issues that are to be considered in the cybersecurity workforce assessment.
